description: During my time as a freelancer on Upwork, I dedicated myself to carrying out various web development projects, both front-end and back-end. I became familiar with the needs of different clients and worked efficiently to deliver high-quality projects on time. I primarily utilized technologies like Node.js for back-end development and frameworks like Angular and React for front-end development.

I worked on improving the usability of their clients interfaces and components. I implemented various modifications in the front-end using React, with the aim of creating a more intuitive and user-friendly experience.

My team and I developed internal applications that boosted productivity by 25% during the pandemic, both for delivery and pick-up. Facilitating order preparation and fast deliveries, as well as reducing fraud. All this thanks to technologies like React, Node.js and Go.
